content.text: Hi [user2]. What do you do for work?
I'm a musician, and I also do some freelance writing on the side.
That sounds really cool! I work as an insurance adjuster, and I also have two kids, a boy and a girl.
Oh, that's great! I'm sure your kids are really cute.
They are! My son is 10 years old, and my daughter is 8 years old.
What do they like to do?
My son loves to play video games, and my daughter loves to read.
That's great! I'm sure they're a lot of fun to be around.
They are! I'm really lucky to have them in my life.
That's great to hear. What are you looking for in a relationship?
I'm looking for someone who is kind, funny, and intelligent. I'm also looking for someone who is interested in the same things that I am, such as music and writing.
That sounds great! I'm sure you'll find someone perfect for you.
